select_difficulty_helper: Fit the test to your level
select_difficulty_helper_desc_ft: First Time: Recommended for people just getting into Chinese
select_difficulty_helper_desc_easy: Easy: You want to only focus on the tones
select_difficulty_helper_desc_normal: Normal: To study both pinyin and tones
select_difficulty_helper_desc_hard: Hard: Perfect what you learned on lower quality audio
select_difficulty_helper_desc_native: Native: Lowest quality audio and timer on, the last challenge
select_difficulty_helper_desc_custom: Custom: To fit the test to your needs
select_shuffle_mode_helper_desc_evenly: Spread evenly: Tone pairs are put into their respective group, a random group if chosen for each element, then a tone pair is taken randomly from that group.
select_shuffle_mode_helper_desc_random: Random: Tone pairs are all grouped together, and a pair is chosen randomly for each element.
